gameDetails.name: Lockup: Kulbak Pack
gameDetails.description:
The Kulbak Pack is a 7 Card mini-expansion for Lockup
It features three new goal cards (instant, leader, and end game) and four new tome cards. Simply add these to your existing game to introduce new challenges and strategies.

Was also available as part of the rewards for backing Game Boy Geek 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

-description from publisher
